text:
Francisco Javier Ortega Smith-Molina (; born 28 August 1968) is a Spanish-Argentine lawyer and politician. Secretary General of Vox, the second most prominent position in the Spanish party after its president Santiago Abascal, he was a member of both the Congress of Deputies and the Madrid City Council since 2019.
On 10 March 2020, during the ongoing coronavirus outbreak, Ortega Smith had tested positive for SARS-CoV-2. Ortega Smith, who had travelled to Lombardy in February,
